summary: Makes weapons, the wood axe, and the pick axe lighter, more realistic weight.
descriptionHtml:
This mod resets the weights for all weapons to be a bit more realistic. I just set a typical weight for each type of weapon and applied it to all versions of that weapon (so an iron sword and an elven sword have the same weight. I did this for simplicity, as I really didn\'t want to make tons of adjustments that might add or subtract one pound).

I got the idea from the Realistic Weapon Weights and Pickaxe and Woodaxe Weight Reduction mods, but here it\'s all one esp.

Weapon - New weight
Battleaxe - 9
Bow - 3
Dagger - 1
Greatsword - 8
Mace - 5
Staff - 3
Sword - 4
Waraxe - 4
Warhammer - 10

Woodaxe - 2.5
Pickaxe - 2.5

To Install: Place the esp in your Skyrim/Data folder.
author: danbuter
